mapper.sql: id, parent_id, name, sort, href, target, icon, is_show, permission, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag
LEFT JOIN u_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.parent_id, a.name, a.href, a.target, a.icon, a.sort, a.is_show, a.permission, a.remarks, a.create_by, a.create_date, a.update_by, a.update_date, a.del_flag, p.name AS "parent_name" FROM u_menu a LEFT JOIN u_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN u_role_menu r ON a.id=r.menu_id AND a.is_show='1' AND r.role_id in (select e.id from u_user u,u_user_role r,u_role e where u.id=r.user_id and r.role_id=e.id and u.id=#{UserId}) order by a.parent_id,a.sort

SELECT a.id, a.parent_id, a.name, a.href, a.target, a.icon, a.sort, a.is_show, a.permission, a.remarks, a.create_by, a.create_date, a.update_by, a.update_date, a.del_flag, p.name AS "parent_name" FROM u_menu a LEFT JOIN u_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN u_role_menu r ON a.id=r.menu_id AND a.is_show='1' AND r.role_id= #{roleId} order by a.parent_id,a.sort
